name: Color Brick Puzzle
description:
It is the most addictive free game with the design and color. Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply drag the blocks, and fill up all grids

How to play:
-Drag the WOOD blocks to move them
-Try to fit them all in the row or column
-Blocks can't be rotated
-Don't worry, no time limits
-Game will be over if there are no room to drag

Features:
-Best block puzzle
-Smooth and delicate animation
-Best wood design and color
-Funny sound effects
-Hours of fun, exciting play
-Simple rules and easy control
-Various blocks and colorful graphic
